item.title: An Exposed Attack
item.description: Recently, The CEO of Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, had to face over forty US senators about hate speech and users’ private information. The inquiries mainly concerned with the safety of Facebook users, as well as the expansion of the application’s role in human’s life. . After nearly five hours in the Supreme Court, the CEO of Facebook admitted his personal responsibility for the failure to protect users’ privacy on social networks and gave a clear explanation about his system.
